    <dd><p>Specifies the configurations of the data disk.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the extended parameter.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.
The available keys are as follows:</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>agency_name</strong>: The agency name to provide temporary credentials for CCE node to access other cloud services.</li>
<li><strong>alpha.cce/NodeImageID</strong>: The custom image ID used to create the BMS nodes.</li>
<li><strong>dockerBaseSize</strong>: The available disk space of a single docker container on the node in device mapper mode.</li>
<li><strong>DockerLVMConfigOverride</strong>: Specifies the data disk configurations of Docker.</li>
</ul>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-deprecated property-replacement"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the charging period of the CCE node. If <code>period_unit</code> is set to <em>month</em>
, the value ranges from 1 to 9. If <code>period_unit</code> is set to <em>year</em>, the value ranges from 1 to 3. This parameter is
mandatory if <code>charging_mode</code> is set to <em>prePaid</em>. Changing this creates a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"

        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the charging period unit of the CCE node.

<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_extendparam_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Extend<wbr>Param</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">map[string]string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the extended parameter.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.
The available keys are as follows:</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>agency_name</strong>: The agency name to provide temporary credentials for CCE node to access other cloud services.</li>
<li><strong>alpha.cce/NodeImageID</strong>: The custom image ID used to create the BMS nodes.</li>
<li><strong>dockerBaseSize</strong>: The available disk space of a single docker container on the node in device mapper mode.</li>
<li><strong>DockerLVMConfigOverride</strong>: Specifies the data disk configurations of Docker.</li>
</ul>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-deprecated property-replacement"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the operating system of the node.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
<ul>
<li>For VM nodes, clusters of v1.13 and later support <em>EulerOS 2.5</em> and <em>CentOS 7.6</em>.</li>
<li>For BMS nodes purchased in the yearly/monthly billing mode, only <em>EulerOS 2.3</em> is supported.</li>
</ul>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_password_go">

        <span class="property-type">string</span>

    <dd><p>Specifies the root password when logging in to select the password mode.

            title="Optional">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the charging period of the CCE node. If <code>period_unit</code> is set to <em>month</em>
, the value ranges from 1 to 9. If <code>period_unit</code> is set to <em>year</em>, the value ranges from 1 to 3. This parameter is
mandatory if <code>charging_mode</code> is set to <em>prePaid</em>. Changing this creates a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the charging period unit of the CCE node.

Changing this creates a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"

        <span class="property-type"><a href="#nodedatavolume">List&lt;Node<wbr>Data<wbr>Volume<wbr>Args&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the configurations of the data disk.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Map&lt;String,String&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the extended parameter.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.
The available keys are as follows:</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>agency_name</strong>: The agency name to provide temporary credentials for CCE node to access other cloud services.</li>
<li><strong>alpha.cce/NodeImageID</strong>: The custom image ID used to create the BMS nodes.</li>
<li><strong>dockerBaseSize</strong>: The available disk space of a single docker container on the node in device mapper mode.</li>
<li><strong>DockerLVMConfigOverride</strong>: Specifies the data disk configurations of Docker.</li>
</ul>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-deprecated property-replacement"

    <dd><p>Specifies the operating system of the node.

<li>For BMS nodes purchased in the yearly/monthly billing mode, only <em>EulerOS 2.3</em> is supported.</li>

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Integer</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the charging period of the CCE node. If <code>period_unit</code> is set to <em>month</em>
, the value ranges from 1 to 9. If <code>period_unit</code> is set to <em>year</em>, the value ranges from 1 to 3. This parameter is
mandatory if <code>charging_mode</code> is set to <em>prePaid</em>. Changing this creates a new resource.</p>

        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the charging period unit of the CCE node.

Changing this creates a new resource.</p>

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">{[key: string]: string}</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the extended parameter.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.
The available keys are as follows:</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>agency_name</strong>: The agency name to provide temporary credentials for CCE node to access other cloud services.</li>
<li><strong>alpha.cce/NodeImageID</strong>: The custom image ID used to create the BMS nodes.</li>
<li><strong>dockerBaseSize</strong>: The available disk space of a single docker container on the node in device mapper mode.</li>
<li><strong>DockerLVMConfigOverride</strong>: Specifies the data disk configurations of Docker.</li>
</ul>

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Mapping[str, str]</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the extended parameter.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.
The available keys are as follows:</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>agency_name</strong>: The agency name to provide temporary credentials for CCE node to access other cloud services.</li>
<li><strong>alpha.cce/NodeImageID</strong>: The custom image ID used to create the BMS nodes.</li>
<li><strong>dockerBaseSize</strong>: The available disk space of a single docker container on the node in device mapper mode.</li>
<li><strong>DockerLVMConfigOverride</strong>: Specifies the data disk configurations of Docker.</li>
</ul>

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the ID of the EIP.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-deprecated property-replacement"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span id="state_eipids_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_eipids_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">eip<wbr>Ids</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;String&gt;</span>

    <dd><p class="property-message">Deprecated:<p>use eip_id instead</p>

            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_extendparam_yaml">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Map&lt;String&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the extended parameter.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.
The available keys are as follows:</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>agency_name</strong>: The agency name to provide temporary credentials for CCE node to access other cloud services.</li>
<li><strong>alpha.cce/NodeImageID</strong>: The custom image ID used to create the BMS nodes.</li>
<li><strong>dockerBaseSize</strong>: The available disk space of a single docker container on the node in device mapper mode.</li>
<li><strong>DockerLVMConfigOverride</strong>: Specifies the data disk configurations of Docker.</li>
</ul>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-deprecated property-replacement"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span id="state_extendparamchargingmode_yaml">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the operating system of the node.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
<ul>
<li>For VM nodes, clusters of v1.13 and later support <em>EulerOS 2.5</em> and <em>CentOS 7.6</em>.</li>
<li>For BMS nodes purchased in the yearly/monthly billing mode, only <em>EulerOS 2.3</em> is supported.</li>
</ul>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_password_yaml">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the root password when logging in to select the password mode.

</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Number</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the charging period of the CCE node. If <code>period_unit</code> is set to <em>month</em>
, the value ranges from 1 to 9. If <code>period_unit</code> is set to <em>year</em>, the value ranges from 1 to 3. This parameter is
mandatory if <code>charging_mode</code> is set to <em>prePaid</em>. Changing this creates a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_periodunit_yaml">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the charging period unit of the CCE node.
Valid values are <em>month</em> and <em>year</em>. This parameter is mandatory if <code>charging_mode</code> is set to <em>prePaid</em>.
Changing this creates a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_postinstall_yaml">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the script to be executed after installation.

## Supporting Types



<h4 id="nodedatavolume">Node<wbr>Data<wbr>Volume</h4>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="size_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#size_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Size</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the size of a virtual space. Only an integer percentage is supported.
Example: 90%. Note that the total percentage of all virtual spaces in a group cannot exceed 100%.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="volumetype_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#volumetype_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Volumetype</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the disk type.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-deprecated property-replacement"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span id="extendparam_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#extendparam_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Extend<wbr>Param</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the extended parameter.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.
The available keys are as follows:</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>agency_name</strong>: The agency name to provide temporary credentials for CCE node to access other cloud services.</li>
<li><strong>alpha.cce/NodeImageID</strong>: The custom image ID used to create the BMS nodes.</li>
<li><strong>dockerBaseSize</strong>: The available disk space of a single docker container on the node in device mapper mode.</li>
<li><strong>DockerLVMConfigOverride</strong>: Specifies the data disk configurations of Docker.</li>
</ul>
<p class="property-message">Deprecated:<p>use extend_params instead</p>
</p></dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="extendparams_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#extendparams_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Extend<wbr>Params</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the disk expansion parameters.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="hwpassthrough_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#hwpassthrough_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Hw<wbr>Passthrough</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd></dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="kmskeyid_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#kmskeyid_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Kms<wbr>Key<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the ID of a KMS key. This is used to encrypt the volume.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<li><strong>alpha.cce/NodeImageID</strong>: The custom image ID used to create the BMS nodes.</li>
<li><strong>dockerBaseSize</strong>: The available disk space of a single docker container on the node in device mapper mode.</li>
<li><strong>DockerLVMConfigOverride</strong>: Specifies the data disk configurations of Docker.</li>

<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="size_nodejs">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#size_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">size</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">number</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the size of a virtual space. Only an integer percentage is supported.
Example: 90%. Note that the total percentage of all virtual spaces in a group cannot exceed 100%.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="volumetype_nodejs">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#volumetype_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">volumetype</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the disk type.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-deprecated property-replacement"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span id="extendparam_nodejs">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#extendparam_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">extend<wbr>Param</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the extended parameter.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.
The available keys are as follows:</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>agency_name</strong>: The agency name to provide temporary credentials for CCE node to access other cloud services.</li>
<li><strong>alpha.cce/NodeImageID</strong>: The custom image ID used to create the BMS nodes.</li>
<li><strong>dockerBaseSize</strong>: The available disk space of a single docker container on the node in device mapper mode.</li>
<li><strong>DockerLVMConfigOverride</strong>: Specifies the data disk configurations of Docker.</li>
</ul>
<p class="property-message">Deprecated:<p>use extend_params instead</p>
</p></dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="extendparams_nodejs">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#extendparams_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">extend<wbr>Params</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">{[key: string]: string}</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the disk expansion parameters.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="hwpassthrough_nodejs">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#hwpassthrough_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">hw<wbr>Passthrough</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">boolean</span>
    </dt>
    <dd></dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<h4 id="nodestorage">Node<wbr>Storage</h4>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="groups_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#groups_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Groups</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#nodestoragegroup">List&lt;Node<wbr>Storage<wbr>Group&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the storage group consists of multiple storage devices.
This is used to divide storage space. Structure is documented below.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="selectors_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#selectors_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Selectors</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#nodestorageselector">List&lt;Node<wbr>Storage<wbr>Selector&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the disk selection.
Matched disks are managed according to match labels and storage type. Structure is documented below.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<h4 id="nodestoragegroup">Node<wbr>Storage<wbr>Group</h4>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="name_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#name_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the virtual space name. Currently, only <strong>kubernetes</strong>, <strong>runtime</strong>,
and <strong>user</strong> are supported. Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="selectornames_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#selectornames_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Selector<wbr>Names</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the list of names of seletors to match.
This parameter corresponds to name in <code>selectors</code>. A group can match multiple selectors,
but a selector can match only one group. Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="virtualspaces_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#virtualspaces_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Virtual<wbr>Spaces</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#nodestoragegroupvirtualspace">List&lt;Node<wbr>Storage<wbr>Group<wbr>Virtual<wbr>Space&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the detailed management of space configuration in a group.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="ccemanaged_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#ccemanaged_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Cce<wbr>Managed</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the whether the storage space is for <strong>kubernetes</strong> and
<strong>runtime</strong> components. Only one group can be set to true. The default value is <strong>false</strong>.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Boolean</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the whether the storage space is for <strong>kubernetes</strong> and
<strong>runtime</strong> components. Only one group can be set to true. The default value is <strong>false</strong>.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<h4 id="nodestoragegroupvirtualspace">Node<wbr>Storage<wbr>Group<wbr>Virtual<wbr>Space</h4>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="name_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#name_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the virtual space name. Currently, only <strong>kubernetes</strong>, <strong>runtime</strong>,
and <strong>user</strong> are supported. Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="size_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#size_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Size</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the size of a virtual space. Only an integer percentage is supported.
Example: 90%. Note that the total percentage of all virtual spaces in a group cannot exceed 100%.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="lvmlvtype_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#lvmlvtype_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Lvm<wbr>Lv<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the LVM write mode, values can be <strong>linear</strong> and <strong>striped</strong>.
This parameter takes effect only in <strong>kubernetes</strong> and <strong>user</strong> configuration. Changing this parameter will create
a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="lvmpath_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#lvmpath_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Lvm<wbr>Path</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the absolute path to which the disk is attached.
This parameter takes effect only in <strong>user</strong> configuration. Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="runtimelvtype_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#runtimelvtype_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Runtime<wbr>Lv<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the LVM write mode, values can be <strong>linear</strong> and <strong>striped</strong>.
This parameter takes effect only in <strong>runtime</strong> configuration. Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="lvmlvtype_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#lvmlvtype_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">lvm<wbr>Lv<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the LVM write mode, values can be <strong>linear</strong> and <strong>striped</strong>.
This parameter takes effect only in <strong>kubernetes</strong> and <strong>user</strong> configuration. Changing this parameter will create
a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="lvmpath_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#lvmpath_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">lvm<wbr>Path</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the absolute path to which the disk is attached.
This parameter takes effect only in <strong>user</strong> configuration. Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="runtimelvtype_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#runtimelvtype_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">runtime<wbr>Lv<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the LVM write mode, values can be <strong>linear</strong> and <strong>striped</strong>.
This parameter takes effect only in <strong>runtime</strong> configuration. Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<h4 id="nodestorageselector">Node<wbr>Storage<wbr>Selector</h4>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="name_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#name_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the virtual space name. Currently, only <strong>kubernetes</strong>, <strong>runtime</strong>,
and <strong>user</strong> are supported. Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="matchlabelcount_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#matchlabelcount_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Match<wbr>Label<wbr>Count</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the number of disks to be selected. If omitted,
all disks of this type are selected. Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="matchlabelmetadatacmkid_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#matchlabelmetadatacmkid_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Match<wbr>Label<wbr>Metadata<wbr>Cmkid</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the cstomer master key ID of an encrypted
disk. Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="matchlabelmetadataencrypted_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#matchlabelmetadataencrypted_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Match<wbr>Label<wbr>Metadata<wbr>Encrypted</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the disk encryption identifier.
Values can be: <strong>0</strong> indicates that the disk is not encrypted and <strong>1</strong> indicates that the disk is encrypted.
If omitted, whether the disk is encrypted is not limited. Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="matchlabelsize_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#matchlabelsize_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Match<wbr>Label<wbr>Size</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the matched disk size. If omitted,
the disk size is not limited. Example: 100. Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="matchlabelvolumetype_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#matchlabelvolumetype_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Match<wbr>Label<wbr>Volume<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the EVS disk type. Currently,
<strong>SSD</strong>, <strong>GPSSD</strong>, and <strong>SAS</strong> are supported. If omitted, the disk type is not limited.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="type_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#type_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the storage type. Currently, only <strong>evs (EVS volumes)</strong> is supported.
The default value is <strong>evs</strong>. Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#matchlabelmetadatacmkid_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">match<wbr>Label<wbr>Metadata<wbr>Cmkid</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the cstomer master key ID of an encrypted
disk. Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="matchlabelmetadataencrypted_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#matchlabelmetadataencrypted_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">match<wbr>Label<wbr>Metadata<wbr>Encrypted</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the disk encryption identifier.
Values can be: <strong>0</strong> indicates that the disk is not encrypted and <strong>1</strong> indicates that the disk is encrypted.
If omitted, whether the disk is encrypted is not limited. Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="matchlabelsize_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#matchlabelsize_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">match<wbr>Label<wbr>Size</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the matched disk size. If omitted,
the disk size is not limited. Example: 100. Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="matchlabelvolumetype_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#matchlabelvolumetype_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">match<wbr>Label<wbr>Volume<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the EVS disk type. Currently,
<strong>SSD</strong>, <strong>GPSSD</strong>, and <strong>SAS</strong> are supported. If omitted, the disk type is not limited.
Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="type_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#type_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the storage type. Currently, only <strong>evs (EVS volumes)</strong> is supported.
The default value is <strong>evs</strong>. Changing this parameter will create a new resource.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

## Import



CCE node can be imported using the cluster ID and node ID separated by a slash, e.g.

```sh
 $ pulumi import huaweicloud:Cce/node:Node my_node 5c20fdad-7288-11eb-b817-0255ac10158b/e9287dff-7288-11eb-b817-0255ac10158b
```

 Note that the imported state may not be identical to your resource definition, due to some attributes missing from the API response, security or some other reason. The missing attributes include`password`, `fixed_ip`, `eip_id`, `preinstall`, `postinstall`, `iptype`, `bandwidth_charge_mode`, `bandwidth_size`, `share_type`, `max_pods`, `extend_param`, `labels`, `taints` and arguments for pre-paid. It is generally recommended running `terraform plan` after importing a node. You can then decide if changes should be applied to the node, or the resource definition should be updated to align with the node. Also you can ignore changes as below. resource "huaweicloud_cce_node" "my_node" {

 ...

 lifecycle {

 ignore_changes = [

 extend_param, labels,

 ]

 } }
